title: DJ Rammus Skinconcept
body:
Hey guys
I thought about an DJ Rammus Skin.
He could be dressed in some sort of an disco outfit.
His Q would turn him into a discoball while his W would cover him in colorfull lights.
His E would be a little dance move that taunts enemies.
While his R is active he would have big speakers on his sides which would send out sound waves which damage enemies.
His Dance could be like his normal one but he'd turn into a discoball and create some sort of dancefloor around him.
The Backport could be something like he turns into a discoball and gets pulled up little by little till he disappeares.

Sorry for my grammar and mistakes.
